snippet: In a conference call Wednesday afternoon with his national finance committee, Mitt Romney said that the president had followed the “old playbook” of wooing specific interest groups.
abstract: In a conference call Wednesday afternoon with his national finance committee, Mitt Romney said that the president had followed the “old playbook” of wooing specific interest groups.

headline.main: Romney Blames Loss on Obama's 'Gifts' to Minorities and Young Voters
